item.title: Sundance Begins Search for Permanent CEO (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: The Sundance Institute, the nonprofit organization which puts on the annual Sundance Film Festival, has begun a formal search for a new chief executive officer, Variety can report exclusively. Board m
